titleStmt.title: Arbitrary government display'd in the tyrannick usurpation of the Rump Parliament and Oliver Cromwell being a clear account of their arbitrary, cruel and illegal proceedings, under the notion of liberty and property, and a compendious history of those times / by a person of honour.
titleStmt.author: Person of honour.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect : tightly bound with slight loss of print; best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
